ygData.subject: Re: Lighstones was Re: Elf Hide Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: ... What ever gave you the idea they backed up nightly? From what I ve seen, from people who have lost all the items on their characters and have actually been
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, Oct 07/99, "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...> wrote:

> Part of the problem isn't so much the physical space required though, as the
> backup time required to conserve all that data every nite routinely.

What ever gave you the idea they backed up nightly? From what I've seen,
from people who have lost all the items on their characters and have
actually been offered a restore of their character information, Verant
backs up once ever week or possibly 2 weeks, as that is usually how far
back the character information that is restored is.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
